Do you want to join a team of entrepreneurs from over 50 different nationalities? To work in an environment powered by passion where no two days are the same?


At trivago we use the latest innovative technologies to empower our users to find their ideal hotel 100 times a second, across 55 different locales world-wide and in 33 different languages.


Are you an intrinsically curious data scientist looking for a position with the freedom to explore some big data?




As a globally recognized metasearch, trivago is a data-lovers dream come true. Join the User Profiling team and help improve the user experience on trivago using ML models to guarantee a personalized user journey or NLP to optimize our search functionality, among others. We're looking for a data scientist eager to work in real time algorithms as part of a cross functional team.




If you're looking for a job in an innovative and dynamic environment that uses data-driven decision making to continuously improve, read on!




Get an inside look at data science at trivago:




https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pNuW3gnrUcQ




What you'll do:

  • Use machine learning techniques to work on real time projects that enable our users to find their ideal hotel.
  • Design, implement and analyse A/B tests to find tune user profiling services.
  • Data crunching and analysis to proactively discover new applicable insights.
  • Propose and investigate measures to evaluate the effectiveness of your algorithms.
  • Work in in a cross-functional team with Big Data Analysts, Data Engineers, Data Scientists and Software Engineers.
  • Stay on top of the latest modeling and algorithm developments and evaluate their potential for implementation to solve our business problems.




What you'll need:

  • 3-5 years of hands-on working experience dealing with problems related to data analysis and machine learning.
  • Strong analytical skills and statistical knowledge. You should be confident in your ability to identify and interpret patterns and outliers.
  • Expert knowledge in at least one scripting language for data science (preferably Python or R), strong experience with database management systems like SQL (preferably also Hive and Impala).
  • A Masters in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Physics or a similar role relevant field.
  • Excellent communication skills and fluent English (our company language).




What you can expect from life at trivago:

  • Growth: We help you grow as trivago grows through support for personal and professional development, constant new challenges, regular peer-feedback, mentorship and world-class training.
  • Autonomy: Every talent has the ability to make an impact independently by driving topics thanks to our strong entrepreneurial mindset, our horizontal workflow and self-determined working hours.
  • International environment: Our agile, international culture and environment with talents from 50+ nations encourages mutual trust and creates a safe space to discuss openly and act freely.
  • Collaborative spaces: Our state-of-the-art campus in Düsseldorf offers interactive spaces where we can easily collaborate, exchange ideas, take a break and workout together.
  • Relocation: We offer our international talents support with relocation costs, work permit and visa questions, free language classes, flat search and insurance.




Additional information:

  • trivago N.V. is an equal opportunity employer. Applications from individuals with disabilities are welcome.
  • To find out more about life at trivago follow us on social media @lifeattrivago.
  • Want to learn more about trivago's business model to prepare for your interview? Visit https://company.trivago.com/our-product/

Do you want to join a team of entrepreneurs from over 50 different nationalities? To work in an environment powered by passion where no two days are the same?


At trivago we use the latest innovative technologies to empower our users to find their ideal hotel 100 times a second, across 55 different locales world-wide and in 33 different languages.


Do you want to have a major impact on the performance of search engine marketing of a leading global hotel search?


Our Data Science team seeks an experienced data scientist to dig into the data of billions of keywords on more than 50 markets and develop an automated bidding algorithm that allows us to bring the right message in front of the right user at the right time.


If you think you can build the ideal algorithm and ensure its smooth operation, read on and apply today!


Get an inside look at data science at trivago:



https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pNuW3gnrUcQ




What you'll do:


  • Work in a big data environment to improve your algorithm's accuracy on estimating the fair value for a given search term.
  • Develop a dynamic bidding algorithm that reflects auction dynamics in order to place the ideal bid and modifiers in the auction.
  • Work in cross-functional teams with account developers, data engineers and analysts to keep improving our systems.




What you'll need:


  • 2+ years' experience working with data science or machine learning.
  • A Master's degree or Diploma in Statistics, Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science or another, role-relevant field.
  • An exceptional understanding of data analysis and statistics and has experience applying it.
  • An excellent understanding of SQL and R or Python. Experience with Hadoop (Hive, Impala, etc.) would be a plus.
  • To be an analytical genius with the ability to handle and draw insights from large amounts of data.
  • Good communication skills and confidence in presenting ideas and findings to stakeholders.
  • To work well independently and prioritize effectively in order to maximize efficiency.
  • Speaks English (our company language) fluently.




What you can expect from life at trivago:


  • Growth: We help you grow as trivago grows through support for personal and professional development, constant new challenges, regular peer-feedback, mentorship and world-class training.
  • Autonomy: Every talent has the ability to make an impact independently by driving topics thanks to our strong entrepreneurial mindset, our horizontal workflow and self-determined working hours.
  • International environment: Our agile, international culture and environment with talents from 50+ nations encourages mutual trust and creates a safe space to discuss openly and act freely.
  • Collaborative spaces: Our state-of-the-art campus in Düsseldorf offers interactive spaces where we can easily collaborate, exchange ideas, take a break and workout together.
  • Relocation: We offer our international talents support with relocation costs, work permit and visa questions, free language classes, flat search and insurance.




Additional information:


  • trivago N.V. is proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. We strongly believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will lead to a better environment for our employees and a better product for our users.
  • To find out more about life at trivago follow us on social media @lifeattrivago.
  • To learn more about tech at trivago, check out our blog: https://tech.trivago.com/
  • Want to learn more about trivago's business model to prepare for your interview? Visit https://company.trivago.com/our-product/.

listings.company: Finiata - Access to cash for small businesses
listings.description:
Finiata is focused on helping small businesses and freelancers focus on what matters. We currently offer an automated financing solution to small businesses in Poland and Germany called Flexkapital. Our plans are to build a data driven neobank for small companies. Our technology is one-of-a-kind so that our customers can get what they deserve. We believe in focusing on long term customer needs and providing the best solutions based on real customer feedback and data.


Finiata was founded in 2016 and is funded by top European investors. Our team is from all across the world with offices in Germany, Poland, and the Ukraine. The team is filled with curious people who want to learn and improve while having fun.


We appreciate the power of diversity and are looking forward to working with you to find real solutions to real customer problems. Join a fast growing company to help over 1 million small businesses in the next 5 years!


YOUR MISSION

  • Working closely with the Data Science team to improve automated decision making
  • Building the infrastructure that drives our loan decision engine
  • Integrating with APIs to download and extract additional features
  • Scraping web pages for new data
  • Maintaining our model deployment pipeline


YOUR PROFILE

  • 3+ years of experience as a Data Engineer using Python
  • Strong knowledge of relational databases
  • Familiarity with the AWS infrastructure
  • Experience in building data pipelines
  • Experience with stream processing, ideally Apache Kafka
  • Passion to learn about new patterns and engage in architectural discussions
  • Drive for writing high-quality code and teaching others to do the same


WHY US?

  • Get to make an impact on thousands of businesses every day
  • Be paid a competitive salary with stock options
  • Participate in a self-organized, continuously improving team
  • Work with the best and learn from other competent and brilliant people
  • Be supported to grow and take leadership from day one
  • Get insights and learnings about the financial business and technology
  • Benefit from remote work opportunities and flexible working hours
  • Benefit from an office in the centre of Berlin with great perks (Free drinks and fresh fruit, Urban Sports Club membership, Pizza Thursday)
  • Have the option to take German language courses
  • Have the option to bring your best buddy to work. We love dogs!
  • Get relocation and visa support

Are you a problem solver? Do you want to build a new platform? Do you want more responsibility? 


We have a great opportunity to join Germany’s largest distributor for dynamic technology. The company has a net worth of €14.2 billion euros and they are renowned for manufacturing high-precision products for machines, equipment, vehicles, aviation and aerospace applications for the biggest names internationally in various sectors.


They have recently made a significant investment into the rollout for a new data & analytics cloud platform to help stream processing and data integration. Now they are searching for experienced DevOps engineers that can help design the integration of the platform, build new CI/CD pipelines, and help implement fresh new ideas.  

 

The technology stack is modern, they are working with; AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, Terraform, Python, Java, Hadoop, ApEK & Linux. 


This is a perfect opportunity for a Senior DevOps Engineer to join to grow eventually into a leadership position. 



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES


  • Create/build/operate Big Data tech and develop/trial/ production environments for data integration
  • Design,  rollout,  & operate -  CI/CD toolchains, ETL data ingestion, and data integration pipelines
  • Execute system administration, monitoring, and maintenance of containerized services.
  •  Actively improve the Data Lake and Data Virtualization Platform
  • Implementation of ETL & streaming tools, messaging, analytics & machine learning services
  • Mentor & consult with mid-level engineers to improve services for the unit 


QUALIFICATIONS


  • Bachelors Degree - Related to  computer science, software engineering, systems engineering
  • Comfortable working in Linux and Bash with a passion for Automation, Logging, and Monitoring
  • Good understanding of setting up and maintaining CI/CD Pipelines
  • Experience working with Cloud Environments - GCP, AWS, Azure 
  • Automation & Configuration Tools Ansible, Terraform, Jenkins, and etc..
  • Experience working with Containers - Docker + Kubernetes, Mesos, Swarm)
  • Good knowledge of Python (or Java)
  • Experience with Distributed Computing Frameworks - Hadoop & Spark, 
  • Strong experience with database Administration, Ticketing-Systems 
  • ETL & SQL is a strong plus


Benefits


  • Company car allowance 
  • A yearly bonus of up to 15% 
  • Monthly team outings and incentives
  • Work on a brand new cloud platform 
  • Relocation package 
  • Investment into training and development for long term progression 
  • English speaking environment 
  • Visa Sponsorship 


How to Apply:

If you are interested in this opportunity, or any other potential roles that may be available to you, apply below for a confidential discussion or contact me directly on +442033758267

Experimentation is at the core of Agoda’s culture and has always been the secret to our success. It’s impossible to overstate the importance of experimentation to Agoda in terms of contribution to our overall strategy, core business optimization, and resource allocation. Experimentation is responsible for linear improvements in practices and processes, to help the entire company become ever more efficient

The Head of Experimentation will work with a team of data scientists for advanced research, and engineers to execute their vision end-to-end all the while being responsible from the research phase all the way through to execution.

You will need to understand various ecommerce metrics and concepts across all functions very well – conversion, revenue, profit, repeat rates, ROI, site performance metrics, and behavioral metrics.

A Successful Head Of Experimentation Will
  • change or enhance Senior Management’s understanding of our business
  • drive corporate strategy through continuous insights
  • improving our systems and practices in experiment-heavy product teams such as pricing, bidding and frontend
  • be responsible for further establishing an experiment-driven culture
  • introducing experimentation to include more parts of the business such as supply, internal platforms, payments, customer service and others.

This role requires strong communication skills particularly upward with C-level management, as well as into the product organization since changing product KPIs, best practices, and day-to-day life will be commonplace. In summary, the Head of Experimentation can expect to work on the cutting edge of technology, big, very-big, and not-so-big data, algorithmic decision-making – all while driving change at a fast-paced, rapid growth tech company.

This position is based in Bangkok and open to candidates worldwide. We will assist you with visa and relocation package, ensuring a smooth transition to working and living in Bangkok

Responsibilities
  • Leading company-wide product innovation in experimentation
  • Help Senior Management in key decisions regarding investment, resource allocation, and strategy
  • Defining KPIs for all projects and evaluating the success of teams and product verticals
  • Evaluating risks and tradeoffs associated with each course of action
  • Working closely with users to ensure all projects meet business needs.


Qualifications
  • Extremely comfortable with data. Proven ability to leverage analytics and quantitative methods to inform and influence decision-making, be able to write complex SQL queries.
  • Entrepreneurial and analytical; effective at driving and managing change in a fast-moving and constantly evolving business
  • Knowledge & understanding of statistics. The ability to challenge & drive high performance from data scientists
  • Experience implementing innovative ideas or products in complex organization
  • Experience working in a fast-paced and high growth environment
  • Enthusiasm to develop engineered processes and technologies and to apply innovative solutions to make organizational improvements while encouraging creative thinking and innovation
  • Exact science degree – a must
  • Advanced degrees in exact science - advantage

Do you want to join a team of entrepreneurs from over 50 different nationalities? To work in an environment powered by passion where no two days are the same?


At trivago we use the latest innovative technologies to empower our users to find their ideal hotel 100 times a second, across 55 different locales world-wide and in 33 different languages.


"I want a hotel with nightlife, an infinity pool, gourmet food, a sparkling clean room, and a balcony with a view of the ocean." This statement exemplifies the types of desires our users have on trivago and our User Profiling team is responsible for knowing and processing what these desires are. This understanding is essential for the optimization of every part of the user's journey on our platform.




Working in User Profiling, you'll have the opportunity to take on this challenge from multiple angles in order to enrich our understanding of our users. You might find yourself working on anything from understanding natural language search queries from the moment users land on trivago and begin to type, to dynamically personalising their hotel search results in near-real time, or even helping users to discover hotels that offer amenities as exciting as an infinity pool.




The User Profiling team consists of 25 passionate software engineers, site reliability engineers, data scientists, data analysts, QA engineers and project managers. We work in a dynamic setup with interdisciplinary teams focused on the backend of search and personalization functionality.




Does predicting the travel desires of millions of trivago users sound exciting? If so, then this is the right position for you ─ read on and apply today!




Get an inside look into tech at trivago:




https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aQYEsuGOs-s




What you'll do:


  • Provide 4 million daily visitors with their ideal hotel through personalization.


  • Contribute to key architecture decisions affecting multiple teams.


  • Build innovative features while writing clean, composable, and testable code.


  • Combine different technologies to design and implement efficient and high performing data-intensive systems.


  • Be creative, challenge yourself and spread the word: Contribute back to open source projects or open-source something yourself.


  • Elevate the output of a cross-functional team by facilitating communication between data


  • scientists, software engineers, project managers, and other passionate experts.




What you'll definitely need:


  • An academic degree in the field of Computer Science or relevant experience developing large applications.


  • At least 3 years of experience in software development, ideally in a high-performance web environment.


  • Experienced in Java with in-depth knowledge of the language internals esp. around the topics of Garbage Collection, Memory and Threading.


  • The ability to break down large goals and design solutions into actionable steps with maintainability as a priority.


  • Enthusiasm for sharing knowledge with other people in and outside the team.


  • A strong understanding of English, our official company language.




What we'd love you to have:


  • Previous experience with AWS or GCP.


  • A solid understanding of distributed systems and their principles such as reliability, scalability, and resilience.


  • A passion for good development practices like test automation, CI/CD, source version control, documentation etc.


  • Good experience with Python.




What to expect from life at trivago:


  • Growth: We help you grow as trivago grows through support for personal and professional development, constant new challenges, regular peer-feedback, mentorship and world-class training.


  • Autonomy: Every talent has the ability to make an impact independently by driving topics thanks to our strong entrepreneurial mindset, our horizontal workflow and self-determined working hours.


  • International environment: Our agile, international culture and environment with talents from 50+ nations encourages mutual trust and creates a safe space to discuss openly and act freely.


  • Collaborative spaces: Our state-of-the-art campus in Düsseldorf offers interactive spaces where we can easily collaborate, exchange ideas, take a break and workout together.


  • Relocation: We offer our international talents support with relocation costs, work permit and visa questions, free language classes, flat search and insurance.




Additional information:


  • trivago N.V. is proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. We strongly believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will lead to a better environment for our employees and a better product for our users.


  • To find out more about life at trivago follow us on social media @lifeattrivago.


  • To learn more about tech at trivago, check out our blog: https://tech.trivago.com/


  • Want to learn more about trivago's business model to prepare for your interview? Visit https://company.trivago.com/our-product/

listings.position: Head of Data Science and Insights at Deep Blue Recruitment
listings.description:
Deep Blue Recruitment are currently working with one of the most successful FinTech companies in Europe that are looking for a Head of Data Science and Insights to join their team in Berlin.

You will be a key part of their leadership team and will have a significant impact on the future direction of the business and the way in which they harness data.

These will be your tasks
  • You lead and develop your team to validate, interpret, and provide insights in dashboards, reports, and presentations for all departments as well as the management team.
  • You use data and information visualisation to actively address unanswered business issues and generate business insights that push the business forward.
  • You provide data mining, pattern and root cause analyses to help business units understand areas of untapped opportunity and develop your team in this direction.
  • You move their BI department to the next level and start to design technical solutions for decision systems and the development of modelling algorithms to be deployed to production.
  • You build, manage, and develop a team of Data Analysts, and Data Scientists.
  • You set a vision, establishing a data-driven culture, and fostering the use of data to inform and make key business decisions


Requirements
  • You have 5+ years of experience leading a data and analytics practice, delivering reporting, insights, and optimisation across a wide variety of businesses.
  • You have played a strategic role collecting, managing and analysing data for different functions incl. marketing, product, operations, and finance.
  • You have a passion for research and data and are highly skilled in performing quantitative analyses related to business and department performance.
  • You are passionate about the inner workings of data technologies, have an understanding of A/B testing as well as vast knowledge in the identification of metrics that drive the long-term health of the business.
  • You understand analytics methodologies and emerging trends, including knowing the best tools to deliver the insights required. You work to innovate our delivery experiences by staying ahead of the curve in delivery offerings and solutions.


They Offer These Benefits
  • Get paid a competitive salary with stock options
  • Optional German language courses
  • Full support to grow and take leadership from day one
  • Work in a beautiful office building located on the riverfront
  • You have the option to take your dog to work!
  • Relocation and visa support if needed

If this sounds interesting to you then please apply today!

Deep Blue Recruitment are currently working with one of the most successful FinTech companies in Europe that are looking for a Lead of Data Engineering to join their team in Berlin.

You will be an integral part of the team and will have a significant impact on the future direction of the business.

These will be your tasks
  • Own our event pipeline and data lake
  • Own the team’s technical strategy in close collaboration with Product and Data analytics
  • Work with the Data Engineering team to develop and improve our Data and Analytics platform
  • Develop and deliver high-impact, forward looking, engineering roadmaps for the team

  • Design and implement continuous integration and deployment processes
  • Liaise with Product teams in productionizing machine learning code

  • You work with Git, Continuous Integration, and TDD
  • You understand what it takes to build and support highly scalable and reliable Big Data platforms

  • 3+ years experience in leading engineering teams
  • Solid understanding of handling event driven pipelines at scale
  • Strong experience in Python development
  • Experience with Scrum and agile development processes and methodologies
  • You work with Git, Continuous Integration, and TDD
  • You understand what it takes to build and support highly scalable and reliable Big Data platforms
  • University degree in Computer Science or a related technical field
  • Strong communication and written skills


Benefits
  • Get paid a competitive salary with stock options
  • Optional German language courses
  • Full support to grow and take leadership from day one
  • Work in a beautiful office building located on the riverfront
  • You have the option to take your dog to work!
  • Relocation and visa support if needed

This is a permanent position and we are looking for someone to start immediately - apply today!

Job Description

At i2x, we are building AI to help people improve the way they communicate. With a focus on speech and text analysis, we are shaping the future of communication. Our platform helps provide real-time feedback to sales and customer services representatives to assist and identify how to get improved results from their phone calls. Since being founded in early 2017 we have grown to almost 40 people in total coming from over 10 different nationalities. We promote a collaborative environment where we encourage everyone to bring forward ideas to help improve i2x and help shape our future.

We are looking for engaged and enthusiastic Software Engineers to join our Backend team. Being a startup with have (almost) no legacy code so you’ll be joining us at a very exciting time and given the chance to shape i2x. We keep our teams small and agile, maximum of 4 developers, where everyone is responsible for development and deployment. Due to our flat structure, we encourage our developers to bring ideas to the table and drive creative solutions. You will be given the opportunity to learn some of the most cutting edge technologies available and be part of a rapidly scaling startup team. We simply enjoy designing, developing and deploying scalable and highly available fault-tolerant backend services

Ideally you’ll come from an engineering or mathematics background (with Degree or equivalent) and will have a strong grasp of Go or C++ algorithms, SQL, Linux and Data Structures. The successful candidate will be an excellent team player who wants to continue learning new technologies!

Must-Haves

 Requirements:
  • Excellent Go and / or Python experience
  • Experience with SQL (e.g. PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL (e.g. MongoDB, Cassandra)
  • System design skills
  • Solid understanding of OS internals and systems programming
  • Degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or related field
  • Strong grasp of algorithms and data structures
  • Proficient Linux user
  • Solid English communication skills

Nice-to-haves
  • Experience implementing RESTful, GraphQL APIs
  • Experience implementing microservices with RPC APIs (Thrift / GRPC)
  • Proficiency with monitoring tools and frameworks
  • Understanding of containerization, hands-on experience with Docker
  • Experience with or willingness to learn other programming languages: Go, Rust
  • Familiarity with modern message streaming/message broker systems: Apache Kafka, Amazon Kinesis and/or Google Pub / Sub

What We Offer
  • Exciting challenges which involve a mix of advanced research and high-quality engineering
  • High degree of autonomy
  • Ownership over your role and functional area
  • Flat hierarchy and open communication
  • Complete transparency into the rest of the company
  • Working with international, highly engaged people
  • Education budget to attend conferences or training
  • Choice of hardware
Salary: Competitive

Location: Berlin - Relocation and Visa assistance provided to those in need

listings.position: Director of Data Science Analytics & Insights -Commercial Operations
listings.description:
JOB DESCRIPTION B.responsible. As Director of Data Science Analytics & Insights in Commercial Operations your main responsibility is to ensure that our massive amount of data is put to the best use. In Commercial Operations we provide support tooling that enables hyper-growth; we’re ‘behind the scenes’, leveraging machine learning (especially NLP/NLG, Machine Translation, Classification and Intent Detection) and data to maximise efficiency and reduce friction for all communication channels. This means generating valuable insights to steer the business, reduce cost, maximise efficiency and reduce friction for our customers in any communication channel they use to reach out for help. In this role you will be leading the data strategy of Commercial Operations and influence its execution directly, through a group of teams in Technology, and indirectly, using you your influence to steer the work of teams and individuals across the organization.
  • Build the vision, set the strategy, and define the roadmap for the effective use of data and the data engineering services in all the teams across Commercial Operations.
  • Ensure that high quality data is always available to generate business insights and that data pipelines incorporate privacy and security elements.
  • Be part of the Commercial Operations Tech & Product leadership team and the subject matter expert when it comes to topics related to Data and Insights.
  • Lead and mentor (Senior) Data Analytics leaders. Recruit, retain and grow world-class talent in Data Engineering and Analytics inside Commercial Operations.
  • Always looking for innovative ways to use data and analytics to drive business performance and meet our company and department objectives
  • Be able to design online and offline large scale experiments that involve multiple areas of the business.
  • Build and maintain strong connections with the global analytics function in Central Product and data engineering in Central Technology.
  • Be an expert in managing stakeholder across the different departments of Commercial Operations (CS, PS, Content) and the Booking.com Leadership Team.
  • Be a trusted advisor for the Commercial Operations Leadership Team and use your skills to explain complex problems in simple terms.
  • Be the point of reference of the larger Data Science & Analytics craft and community in Commercial Operations. Ensure that everyone in this community has the right support and is able to do their best work and grow in their craft B.Skilled
  • 7+ years of experience leading large analytics and/or data engineering teams at a high growth enterprise.
  • Able to smoothly introduce changes using excellent stakeholder management, change-management, and story-telling skills.
  • Subject matter expertise in Data Engineering, Data Science and Analytics with a proven track record of working on successful innovative products. Set the vision and strategy to use data to steer the business and maximize the success of the product aligned with team and business goals.
  • Experience with managing and coaching teams of senior analytics managers including building and growing teams.
  • Experience working with product and tech departments and cross functional senior stakeholders.
  • Expert in leading through influence with stakeholders including executives. B.offered This position is open to candidates worldwide and when hired we provide Visa and Relocation assistance. Technology is the core of our business and we ensure that we give the best ‘deal’ possible, to our employees. Here is what you get:
  • Living and working in Amsterdam, one of the most cosmopolitan cities in Europe
  • Contributing to a high scale, complex, world renowned product and seeing real time impact of your work
  • Working in a fast paced and performance driven culture
  • Career Advancement via Online and On-the-job training, Hackathons, Conferences and active community participation
  • Competitive compensation and benefits package and some great added perks of working in the home city of Booking.com

Are you a talented Developer experienced with either Python and/or Java and open to work with both of these development languages? If you are living in or able to relocate to the beautiful, international city of Amsterdam? Please read on.


I'm looking for a highly skilled, highly motivated Python / Java Data Developer to work on a greenfield project developing a data analytics platform. This is a newly formed team and you will be working closely with Data Scientists and the business in a technically challenging environment. You will have the opportunity to work with the most up-to-date technologies and methods in a highly agile environment.


As the main data provider for the finance industry our client's systems handle huge amounts of data. They are building on top of their current layers to get more value from this data.




Your Profile:


* MSc Computer Science or related


* Solid experience with Python and / or Java (OO)

 
* Able to develop and maintain APIs and SDKs, primarily in Python and Java


* You are accurate and able to write solid, scalable code


* Excellent analytical and problem solving skills


* You have strong communication skills and are a team player




In this critical role to take our clients service to the next level, you will really have the opportunity to influence the company's success. Our client offer an exciting opportunity to accelerate your career in a professional and fun environment. You will also be offered continuous professional development and training.


Above market average salary, excellent bonus scheme and secondary benefits.


Visa sponsorship available

Working Location: Bangkok, Thailand

This is a full time, permanent role in Bangkok, Thailand. Full relocation and Visa sponsorship provided.

Do you want to practice an agile ML product research at its mastery? Come leap forward with us! We’ve assembled a team of 25 researchers from all around the world (and more than 250 data engineers) who crack daily some of the toughest ML problems – at the extreme of the scale – within the e-commerce domain. We do it all: answering and routing emails automatically; driving traffic to our site using sophisticated bidding engines; personalizing every corner of the site via state of the art deep learning models; etc.

At Our Core We Are The Masters Of Combining Science And Business; Our Ideal Candidate Would Be Able To Do The Same With The Following Signature
  • Understand the power of agile iterations where you only look to move a little further by combining business insights with the power of hands-on machine learning.
  • Understand data, its quirks, its power, but most importantly that nothing about it can be taken for granted (so we must spend infinite amount of time getting intimate with it).
  • Have an end-to-end and hands-on mindset: you start with an idea (or many of them), run a POC or build an MVP, launch an A/B test (and often a few of them), deploy the wins, setup up proper monitoring, reflect, and repeat.
  • A team player, a collaborator, a colleague, an associate, a family member.

You like our vision? We’re glad you do! Come join us and we’ll happily share the wealth.

We Do Have a Few Prerequisites, These Are Not Hard Barriers But Rather Are Insights Into Our Preferences (but We Embrace Diversity And Exceptionalism)
  • 2 years minimum experience in roles that extensively utilize coding, data handling, statistics, and machine learning (5 years are even better).
  • An academic quantitative degree, preferably a PhD.
  • Coding, coding, coding (did we mention coding? R, Python, C#, Java, C++, Scala, …)
  • Extras: SQL, NLP, DL, TF, business acumen, blog writing, good sense of humor

Working Location: Bangkok, Thailand

This is a full time, permanent role in Bangkok, Thailand. Full relocation and Visa sponsorship provided.

Part of Booking Holdings (BKNG), Agoda is the largest and fastest growing online travel platform in Asia. We are looking for ambitious data scientists that would like to take part in implementing cutting edge technologies on one of the largest and quickest moving data sets worldwide.

We move fast, work on tough challenges, laugh and do that from one of the most exciting and vibrant places in the world today - Bangkok Thailand.

Agodans come from over 70 countries: It’s an incredible technical creative melting pot of talents pin-picked from all corners of the planet.

On your day-to-day work you will change the way people run their lives and help our business to grow, improve and expand to new exciting domains. Your voice will be heard, and you will be able to make a difference in a business that touches millions of users in every hour of the day!

Responsibilities

How will your day look like?
  • Build state of the art models and algorithms to support operations and business decisions.
  • Mine our big data to find actionable insights to drive ongoing improvements and fertilize new discoveries.
  • Work with developers and business owners to deliver daily results with the best quality.
  • Discover, research and harness new ideas that can make a difference.


Qualifications

The Musts
  • Open-minded quick learner with desire to explore and keep up with the latest technologies.
  • 3+ years hands on experience as a data scientist / statistician / data engineer.
  • Hands on experience and understanding of ML/AI and related software libraries.
  • Hands on experience with Deep Learning frameworks like Keras, TF, PyTorch and/or others.
  • Excellent Proficiency in SQL and languages like Python and/or Scala.
  • Independent as well as great team player.
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills for working in a multicultural work environment.

Great if you have them
  • MSc+ in Computer Science / Operations Research / Statistics or other quantitative fields (a PhD is a major plus).
  • Experience in NLP, image processing and/or recommendation systems.
  • Hands on experience working with big data framework like Spark/Hadoop.
  • Experience in data science for e-commerce.

Automotive Performance Engineer Data Scientist Are you a data-driven person with automotive affinity? Do you want play a key role in the development of our high quality engines? If so, automotive client in Eindhoven might have the opportunity you are looking for! As System Performance Data Scientist you are responsible for data analysis within the Engine Development department, part of Product Development group. Several data sources are available that provide information on specific performance characteristics of both Engine and After treatment system integrated in customer and field test vehicles. Your responsibilities:
  • Working in multi-disciplinary teams to discover and develop high-impact data analytics need and data opportunities in the Engine and After treatment development department
  • Report on current system performance and suggest improvement areas
  • Setup storage and processing of data
  • Develop and monitor KPI’s on system performance
  • Setup processes to transfer different data sources to useable formats for Product Development
  • Setup and improve standard reporting for engineering and management purposes
  • Perform ad-hoc data analyses to support Product Development In the position of Performance Data Scientist you will report to the Engineering Supervisor System Performance. Job profile
  • Technical education on Master or Bachelor level in Automotive Technology, Mechanical Engineering, Data science, or similar
  • Proven affinity with data analysis
  • Highly proficient in Matlab and Microsoft Excel, Knowledge on R and Tableau is preferable
  • Experienced in working in multidisciplinary teams
  • Attention to details and delivering high quality work
  • Strong analytical skills with a results oriented attitude
  • Great communication skills in both written and verbal form
  • Fluent in English and Dutch Department You’ll be part of the Engine Integration & Validation department (EI&V). EI&V is amongst others responsible for integration of the engine and after treatment into an optimized system working together with all types of vehicles. This integrated system should have robust and precise diagnostic capabilities. Offer We are here to guide engineers in the maze of vacancies to obtain a position to be proud of. Mechanical engineering, electrical engineering and software are the technical pillars of Trinamics, but their application is diverse. Because we know our clients and candidates well, we quickly see where someone would fit best. Once we find a position we remain involved in the process. We do this by, among other things, offering training and development programs. We offer extra guidance and our social network to talents who leave their homes in another country to realize their ambitions here. In our eyes, it is the only logical way to keep developing our technical talents. Progress is also what drives Trinamics. With every good performance, we set a new bar to surpass. And we do that time and time again. Relocation support (where applicable): Seeing as Trinamics feels it is important you can fully focus on working in a new organization in a new role, next to adjusting to a new life in a new country and culture, we’re here to help you in a smooth relocation. We are experienced in assisting you on the visa application process, travel, short and long stay, 30% ruling (tax exemption) application, health insurance, setting up a bank account, Dutch language courses and (in case it’s needed) finding proper schooling for your child(ren).

Job Description
The Key Account Technologist is the ASM product expert who supports extensive customer and internal company contacts for coordinating the introduction of new products, product improvements, and non-conformances/escalations at the customer.

This includes leading projects/programs supporting these activities. The focus of this job is on managing all the technical account aspects of the customers in the assigned region.

Other tasks involve:

  • Drive NPI & Eval by leading the project including hands-on work at the customer location, Implement BU developed BKMs or CIPs at customer and execute necessary actions and modifications.
  • Provide answers to our customers by identifying problems, researching answers and guiding customer through corrective steps to resolve high value problems at customer sites.
  • Understand customer timelines for film development / roadmaps for current and future technology nodes and transfers the information to GPM/BD/R&D.
  • Identify technical inflections points and work with R&D to ensure customer requirements and learnings are implemented into product development.
  • Be responsible for the performance of our equipment at the customer. Customer specifications which are non-ASM standard are signed by the KAT.
  • Recognize early non-conformance of our product and takes the necessary steps for corrective actions, including analyzing data, involving hardware and process exports
  • Take responsibility to solve any escalation as efficient as possible problems, for NPI and installed base
  • Accomplish the missions from information systems (account team and business development) and organization (product management, KPU CVD) by completing related tasks as needed.


Education & Experience

  • Master degree (or above) in chemical engineering, electrical engineering, physics, or material science.
  •  7+ years (4+ years for Ph.D.) experience in the semiconductor wafer processing or capital equipment industry.  
  • Related work experience can include process engineering and technical marketing.
  • Direct experience with silicon wafer processing is a benefit or an equivalent combination of education and experience from which comparable knowledge, skills, and ability have been achieved.

Skills

  • Written and verbal communication skills including excellent presentation skills required.  
  • Analytical thought and analysis abilities are needed to function in this position.  
  • Manage multiple conflicting priorities towards the local account teams and within product line in support of introducing new equipment at the involved customer(s).

Travel

  • Up to 80%
  • Up to 50% intercontinental travel with extended stays, compensated by ASM global travel policy
  • Regular travel to ASM R&D labs

We offer you

 

You will work within a very dynamic, high tech and international company but with an open culture and a flat organizational structure. You will experience cross-functional responsibility within different departments and we appeal to your need to drive innovation, leave your own mark and deliver excellence. Next to this, we offer you:

·       A competitive salary package.

·       A fully paid relocation package including possible visa / work permit application, housing, tax support and shipment of household goods.

·       An attractive yearly bonus incentive depending on education and experience

Please follow us on LinkedIn and Facebook and find out more on why you should join us!  

 Want to Apply?

If you’re a team player who is passionate for Engineering and Semiconductors and we’ve just described your career aspirations, then please click on the APPLY button. If you have any question around the procedure please contact Richard van der Vegt (Recruitment Partner) on +31649983439.


For more career opportunities, visit our career site: http://www.asm.com/EN/careers/join-us

listings.position: Software/Mobile developer (OpenGL, C++, Vulkan, GTest, Gmock, iOS, Android)
listings.description: Software/Mobile developer (OpenGL, C++, Vulkan, GTest, Gmock, iOS, Android) Intro Are you a Software/Mobile developer with experience in the software domain looking for the next chapter in your career? Our partner, a multinational, active in the navigation industry is looking for a Software/Mobile developer to extend their team. Do you like to get the best out of yourself and your colleagues and prefer to work in an informal environment? This job opportunity might be very interesting for you! About our client Our client delivers several platforms, ranging from mobile devices to desktops and browsers. When you will work with our client you get to work on the rendering of the map but you will also get introduced to other parts of our clients navigation software to work on the services that provide the roads, traffic and routs. They are looking for Software/Mobile developer who will work in a software engineering scrum team. He or she should be able to support the team in verifying that the user stories comply with the Definition of Done and the software to be delivered is of sufficient quality to be released. Your challenge You will produce ‘simple’ code in a dynamic, divers and collaborative environment You will work on the line between the user and interface and the code, you appreciate the beauty of both You will constantly grow, led by your curiosity to grab the many development opportunities at TomTom and stay up to speed with the latest tools and techniques in an ever-changing technological landscape. Your profile You are a professional in C++ software development for mobile or embedded devices with strict power and memory constraints, and/or server-based solutions. You have the aspiration to be(come) an expert in computer graphics, in designing and developing visual simulations of complex data structures. You have hands-on experience with OpenGL (ES). Experience with Vulkan or Metal is a plus. You’ve got experience with automated testing, for example with GTest and GMock, You have experience with iOS or Android application development You have understanding of DevOps (bonus points) Education You finished a Bachelor or Master in Computer Science, mathematics or equivalent Interested? Do you feel you are the most suitable person for this position or do you have any further questions? Send your CV call 040-4015200 and ask for Mark Simons. We are here to guide engineers in the maze of vacancies to obtain a position to be proud of. Proud because it is at a leading company, because the new position increases own influence or because it’s the best fitting position in terms of content. Mechanical engineering, electrical engineering and software are the technical pillars of Trinamics, but their application is diverse. Because we know our clients and candidates well, we quickly see where someone would fit best. Once we find a position we remain involved in the process. We do this by, among other things, offering training and development programs. We offer extra guidance and our social network to talents who leave their homes in another country to realize their ambitions here. In our eyes, it is the only logical way to keep developing our technical talents. Every technical company wants to move forward as quickly as possible, to be leading. For that you need the best technical people. However, in the current market, talent is scarce and not always easy to find. Progress is also what drives Trinamics. With every good performance, we set a new bar to surpass. And we do that time and time again. Relocation support (where applicable): Seeing as Trinamics feels it is important you can fully focus on working in a new organization in a new role, next to adjusting to a new life in a new country and culture, we’re here to help you in a smooth relocation. We are experienced in assisting you on the visa application process, travel, short and long stay, 30% ruling (tax exemption) application, health insurance, setting up a bank account, Dutch language courses and (in case it’s needed) finding proper schooling for your child(ren).

listings.position: Lead Data Engineering - Based in Berlin - Amsterdam
listings.description:
Ever considered a move to the German capital Berlin?

Deep Blue Recruitment are currently working with one of the most successful FinTech companies in Europe that are looking for a Lead of Data Engineering to join their team in Berlin.

You will be an integral part of the team and will have a significant impact on the future direction of the business.

These will be your tasks
  • Own our event pipeline and data lake
  • Own the team’s technical strategy in close collaboration with Product and Data analytics
  • Work with the Data Engineering team to develop and improve our Data and Analytics platform
  • Develop and deliver high-impact, forward looking, engineering roadmaps for the team
  • Develop initiatives on ensuring data quality, accuracy, and reliability across the whole data organization
  • Implement and maintain APIs and microservices to integrate heterogeneous data sources into our Data pipeline
  • Design and implement continuous integration and deployment processes
  • Liaise with Product teams in productionizing machine learning code

Requirements
  • 7+ years experience in a similar engineering portfolio
  • 3+ years experience in leading engineering teams
  • Solid understanding of handling event driven pipelines at scale
  • Strong experience in Python development
  • Experience with Scrum and agile development processes and methodologies
  • You work with Git, Continuous Integration, and TDD
  • You understand what it takes to build and support highly scalable and reliable Big Data platforms
  • University degree in Computer Science or a related technical field
  • Strong communication and written skills

Benefits
  • Get paid a competitive salary with stock options
  • Optional German language courses
  • Full support to grow and take leadership from day one
  • Work in a beautiful office building located on the riverfront
  • You have the option to take your dog to work!
  • Relocation and visa support if needed
This is a permanent position and we are looking for someone to start immediately - apply today!

  • Develop initiatives on ensuring data quality, accuracy, and reliability across the whole data organization
  • Implement and maintain APIs and microservices to integrate heterogeneous data sources into our Data pipeline
  • Design and implement continuous integration and deployment processes
  • Liaise with Product teams in productionizing machine learning code


Requirements
  • 7+ years experience in a similar engineering portfolio
  • 3+ years experience in leading engineering teams
  • Solid understanding of handling event driven pipelines at scale
  • Strong experience in Python development
  • Experience with Scrum and agile development processes and methodologies
  • You work with Git, Continuous Integration, and TDD
  • You understand what it takes to build and support highly scalable and reliable Big Data platforms
  • University degree in Computer Science or a related technical field
  • Strong communication and written skills


Benefits
  • Get paid a competitive salary with stock options
  • Optional German language courses
  • Full support to grow and take leadership from day one
  • Work in a beautiful office building located on the riverfront
  • You have the option to take your dog to work!
  • Relocation and visa support if needed

This is a permanent position and we are looking for someone to start immediately - apply today!

listings.position: Head of Data Science and Insights - Role based in Berlin - Amsterdam
listings.description:
Deep Blue Recruitment are currently working with one of the most successful FinTech companies in Europe that are looking for a Head of Data Science and Insights to join their team in Berlin.

You will be a key part of their leadership team and will have a significant impact on the future direction of the business and the way in which they harness data.

These will be your tasks
  • You lead and develop your team to validate, interpret, and provide insights in dashboards, reports, and presentations for all departments as well as the management team.
  • You use data and information visualisation to actively address unanswered business issues and generate business insights that push the business forward.
  • You provide data mining, pattern and root cause analyses to help business units understand areas of untapped opportunity and develop your team in this direction.
  • You move their BI department to the next level and start to design technical solutions for decision systems and the development of modelling algorithms to be deployed to production.
  • You build, manage, and develop a team of Data Analysts, and Data Scientists.
  • You set a vision, establishing a data-driven culture, and fostering the use of data to inform and make key business decisions

Requirements
  • You have 5+ years of experience leading a data and analytics practice, delivering reporting, insights, and optimisation across a wide variety of businesses.
  • You have played a strategic role collecting, managing and analysing data for different functions incl. marketing, product, operations, and finance.
  • You have a passion for research and data and are highly skilled in performing quantitative analyses related to business and department performance.
  • You are passionate about the inner workings of data technologies, have an understanding of A/B testing as well as vast knowledge in the identification of metrics that drive the long-term health of the business.
  • You understand analytics methodologies and emerging trends, including knowing the best tools to deliver the insights required. You work to innovate our delivery experiences by staying ahead of the curve in delivery offerings and solutions.
They offer these benefits
  • Get paid a competitive salary with stock options
  • Optional German language courses
  • Full support to grow and take leadership from day one
  • Work in a beautiful office building located on the riverfront
  • You have the option to take your dog to work!
  • Relocation and visa support if needed
If this sounds interesting to you then please apply today!

Working Location: Bangkok, Thailand

This is a full time, permanent role in Bangkok, Thailand. Full relocation and Visa sponsorship provided.

Part of Booking Holdings (BKNG), Agoda is the largest and fastest growing online travel platform in Asia. We are looking for ambitious data scientists that would like to take part in implementing cutting edge technologies on one of the largest and quickest moving data sets worldwide.

We move fast, work on tough challenges, laugh and do that from one of the most exciting and vibrant places in the world today - Bangkok Thailand.

Agodans come from over 70 countries: It’s an incredible technical creative melting pot of talents pin-picked from all corners of the planet.

On your day-to-day work you will change the way people run their lives and help our business to grow, improve and expand to new exciting domains. Your voice will be heard, and you will be able to make a difference in a business that touches millions of users in every hour of the day!

Responsibilities

How will your day look like?
  • Build state of the art models and algorithms to support operations and business decisions.
  • Mine our big data to find actionable insights to drive ongoing improvements and fertilize new discoveries.
  • Work with developers and business owners to deliver daily results with the best quality.
  • Discover, research and harness new ideas that can make a difference.


Qualifications

The Musts
  • Open-minded quick learner with desire to explore and keep up with the latest technologies.
  • 3+ years hands on experience as a data scientist / statistician / data engineer.
  • Hands on experience and understanding of ML/AI and related software libraries.
  • Hands on experience with Deep Learning frameworks like Keras, TF, PyTorch and/or others.
  • Excellent Proficiency in SQL and languages like Python and/or Scala.
  • Independent as well as great team player.
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills for working in a multicultural work environment.

Great if you have them
  • MSc+ in Computer Science / Operations Research / Statistics or other quantitative fields (a PhD is a major plus).
  • Experience in NLP, image processing and/or recommendation systems.
  • Hands on experience working with big data framework like Spark/Hadoop.
  • Experience in data science for e-commerce.

Working Location: Bangkok, Thailand

This is a full time, permanent role in Bangkok, Thailand. Full relocation and Visa sponsorship provided.

Do you want to practice an agile ML product research at its mastery? Come leap forward with us! We’ve assembled a team of 25 researchers from all around the world (and more than 250 data engineers) who crack daily some of the toughest ML problems – at the extreme of the scale – within the e-commerce domain. We do it all: answering and routing emails automatically; driving traffic to our site using sophisticated bidding engines; personalizing every corner of the site via state of the art deep learning models; etc.

At Our Core We Are The Masters Of Combining Science And Business; Our Ideal Candidate Would Be Able To Do The Same With The Following Signature
  • Understand the power of agile iterations where you only look to move a little further by combining business insights with the power of hands-on machine learning.
  • Understand data, its quirks, its power, but most importantly that nothing about it can be taken for granted (so we must spend infinite amount of time getting intimate with it).
  • Have an end-to-end and hands-on mindset: you start with an idea (or many of them), run a POC or build an MVP, launch an A/B test (and often a few of them), deploy the wins, setup up proper monitoring, reflect, and repeat.
  • A team player, a collaborator, a colleague, an associate, a family member.

You like our vision? We’re glad you do! Come join us and we’ll happily share the wealth.

We Do Have a Few Prerequisites, These Are Not Hard Barriers But Rather Are Insights Into Our Preferences (but We Embrace Diversity And Exceptionalism)
  • 2 years minimum experience in roles that extensively utilize coding, data handling, statistics, and machine learning (5 years are even better).
  • An academic quantitative degree, preferably a PhD.
  • Coding, coding, coding (did we mention coding? R, Python, C#, Java, C++, Scala, …)
  • Extras: SQL, NLP, DL, TF, business acumen, blog writing, good sense of humor

การจัดการสินค้า
อินเทอร์เน็ต
listings.category: การจัดการสินค้า
listings.description:
Do you geek out on schema markup and meta data? Does seeing a failed canonical implementation make your skin crawl? Are you obsessive about using data to determine what moves the SEO needle? Then you might be the rock star we’ve been searching for to join our growing SEO team!

This is an amazing opportunity to work on the cutting edge of technology, in a rapidly growing company with some of the sharpest minds in the industry. And perhaps best of all, you’d get to live in one of the world’s most beautiful countries, top-rated by expats from around the globe. Kickstart your life with agoda!

Who is agoda?

Agoda is a hotel booking website, part of the Booking Holdings Group, the largest and fastest growing travel portfolio in the world. We run alongside Booking.com, Kayak, RentalCars.com and more. The best part is that each brand operates independently, meaning we have the resources of a big enterprise, but the mentality of an entrepreneurial startup.

What’s so great about this SEO gig?
  • Your focus is on ranking optimization. Leverage data, run tests, learn and evolve your SEO skillset to discover what works in our incredibly competitive industry.
  • We operate at massive scale! Over 120 million SEO-optimized landing pages in 50 different languages. There’s a lot of work to do.
  • You decide the roadmap. There’s virtually no red tape to get it approved. Have a crazy idea that you think will move the dial? Start your team of software engineers working on it tomorrow. We are very fast-moving and entrepreneurial.
  • Agoda attracts top talent from brands like Google, Microsoft and Amazon, which means you’re working with and learning from the best. Need expert Designers? Sure thing. How about Data Scientists to solve a very hard problem? We got you covered. Do you have an appetite for machine learning? Go grab lunch with our ML team.­
  • Lastly, you get to live and work in Bangkok, Thailand. Not only is it a vibrant, beautiful country, but it’s the perfect travel hub to explore all of Asia. It’s time to see the world!

So what’s it like to work at agoda?

In three hyphened words: fast-paced, data-driven, and extremely-rewarding.

Agoda’s product team is the company’s engine for innovation. A product owner is the CEO of their product, operating with considerable autonomy. We are responsible for defining and executing on a vision for our products, as well as communicating that vision to senior management. We see our ideas come to life, iterate on success and learn from failures.

Product owners can expect to work on the cutting edge of technology, data, digital marketing, algorithmic decision-making and consumer psychology – all at a scale that very few ecommerce companies in the world today can offer. And, you get to live in Thailand!

Agoda covers expenses related to getting a work permit, visa and relocating you, your family and belongings to Bangkok. We make it easy for you to start a new chapter in life.

Responsibilities
  • Develop a roadmap and lead your team of software engineers, making your vision come to life. Relentlessly prioritize innovations to achieve ranking KPIs
  • Communicate your vision extensively with stakeholders across the organization, particularly in the marketing department
  • Closely manage a sprint team of engineers to execute on the roadmap. Write detailed user stories in consultation with the content team, UX specialists, designers, and analysts
  • Act quickly on trends and opportunities by staying up-to-date on SEO in an extremely dynamic and competitive industry


Qualifications And Experience
  • Enterprise SEO experience, preferably at a large-scale ecommerce or travel company
  • Extremely comfortable with data and analysis. Proven ability to leverage analytics and quantitative methods to inform and influence decision-making
  • Passion for rapidly designing and building projects, then A/B testing their success with users and bots
  • Entrepreneurial and analytical; effective at managing change in a fast-moving and constantly evolving business
  • Ability to motivate and inspire engineering teams to achieve beyond what they imagined possible


Preferred Qualifications
  • MBA in business, advanced math or engineering degree
  • Experience with emerging data-mining technology, machine learning or data science
  • Able to write complex SQL queries
  • Programming skills a plus

#sanfrancisco #newyork #seattle #paris #telaviv #london #toronto #singapore #PRDM #5

listings.position: Global Head of Data Science – Bangkok based
tags: กึ่งอาวุโส
งานเต็มเวลา
เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ
อินเทอร์เน็ต
listings.category: เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ
listings.description:
Agoda is one of the world’s largest and fastest growing online travel agents. Coming from over 70+ countries, our 5,000-plus person team is young, energetic, and hyper-focused on every last detail of the travel experience. Our parent company, Booking Holdings, owns several other premier travel brands, including Booking.com, Priceline.com, Kayak, and OpenTable.com, making us the largest and fastest growing travel portfolio in the world. But the group is focused on entrepreneurialism, and each brand operates independently, allowing us to experiment and move fast.

Our 25-strong Data Science team is already responsible for a big portion of our success, we deploy ML across the board. Our marketing automation is managing a budget of 100Ms$ with automated bidding, our recommendation and ranking engines give billions of predictions a day based on deep learning models running in production. Our NLP lab is perfecting the chat engine in order to reduce customer frustration and there are many other examples, including fraud, pricing, experimentation, anomaly detection etc. All of this is running on our home-grown data platform, currently collecting 1.2 trillion data points every day.

But we are still not satisfied

So far, we have been using Data Science to *improve* the product, but now it’s time for a revolution. We want to use data science in every aspect of the product, front or back, make it clear to the customer that we are giving them a superb experience from all aspects and empower the entirety of our tech team to utilize our data in real time.

A vision like this requires a leader that can combine strategy, execution, communication and intelligence to take materialize these ideas all the way to the customer, are you that person?

As The Global Head Of Data Science, You Will

Manage and grow our DS teams, our team is mostly MSc and PhD graduates from top universities around the world, including Stanford, Harvard and others. Talent is the key to a success in data science and we need to make sure we keep our strong team engaged and motivated while growing it

Drive revolutionary initiatives. you will be responsible for the company future by making sure we are in front of the innovation curve. We will go into projects that have not been done before at our scale, this will require world-class data science but also the ability to communicate effectively with senior management and get them on board. Agoda is a well-tuned machine and any change is tested, making big steps requires careful planning to make sure we eventually follow the customer needs.

Deliver results. As the head of the data science team, you are responsible for our success across all products, sometimes that means understanding why some models aren’t working as expected, sometimes it’s about having the right people on the right projects and sometimes is some dependent system that we need to augment in order to achieve our goals. In any case, the responsibility and ownership is on you to get the desired outcome

Build for the future. These are exciting days for data science and machine learning, new technology pops up every few days, from modeling to data processing to orchestration it’s clear that there’s currently no one “right way to do it”. Agoda has always been a very independent company, we want to control our fate and our technology so we almost never use “enterprise software” and rely mostly on open source that we can tweak and contribute back to. You’ll be responsible our strategic technical roadmap for data science, thinking about problem like measuring model’s health, centralized feature stores, orchestrating model deployment and others.

Work in one of Asia’s most vibrant cities. Bangkok provides a setting like no other: edgy, luxurious, impossibly sensorial, endlessly layered. The perfect junction of a globally minded career and the heart of Asian travel.

What You’ll Get The Chance To Do
  • Lead the managers of the different DS teams across 3 different offices (Bangkok, Singapore and Israel). Mentor them to grow and develop their teams
  • Oversee the execution of all DS related initiatives and projects from initiation to production and beyond
  • Join senior management in key discussion to facilitate a scientific approach in key decisions and raise new initiatives
  • Interface with all business and product units to help shape the future of the product and find the opportunities where DS can be helpful
  • Drive a culture of science and ML in the company, plan how to educate and train our 1200 people tech team to utilize DS in every aspect of our products


What You Bring
  • Vast analytical problem-solving capabilities & experience.
  • Experience in leading teams of data scientists and data engineers, preferably in an ecommerce, tech, advertising or management consulting environment.
  • Strong knowledge in Statistics, DS and ML practices and technologies, specifically in big data environments
  • Strong understanding and implementation experience of predictive modeling algorithms such as regressions, time series, neural networks, clustering, decision trees and heuristic models, with familiarity dealing with tradeoffs between model performance and business needs.
  • Experienced with planning and managing ML projects in real time environments with incremental testing capabilities.
  • Fantastic communication skills that enable you to work cross-functionally with product managers, tech geeks and design gurus, building solid relationships with a diverse set of stakeholders.
  • The ability to convey complex solutions to a less technical person.
  • Bias for action.
  • Advanced degree (MSc/PhD) in Computer Science, Economics, Engineering, Operations Research, Physics or Mathematics/Statistics preferred.


This position is open to worldwide and local candidates and we will assist you with a generous relocation package and visa sponsorship ensuring a smooth transition to working and living in Bangkok.

listings.description:
This is a permanent job located in Bangkok, Thailand. We will provide relocation and visa sponsorship.

Agoda is one of the world’s largest and fastest growing online travel agents. Coming from over 70+ countries, our 5,000-plus person team is young, energetic, and hyper-focused on every detail of the travel experience. Our parent company, Booking Holdings, owns several other premier travel brands, including Booking.com, Priceline.com, Kayak, and OpenTable.com, making us the largest and fastest growing travel portfolio in the world. But the group is focused on entrepreneurialism, and each brand operates independently, allowing us to experiment and move fast.

We think of Data Science in Agoda differently. For us, a data scientist is a fusion of core production skills with analytic and business skills. We’ve brought top talents from (literally) all over the world who focus relentlessly on building products which utilize ML and AI as their main edge. We know that when you infuse ML and technology, you move from good to great and that is our mission. Our Data Science managers are action driven leaders that can form vivid vision and successfully direct their people to execute it while being strongly rooted in the details and practice.

As a Data Science Manager, You Will

Drive the growth of your team and build a diverse, entrepreneurial team. You are a developer of people. You love leading diverse teams of professionals with both qualitative and quantitative backgrounds using data-driven and insights-led approaches to respond quickly in a dynamic, competitive, and fast changing industry.

Get your hands dirty. Tackle complex problems in the online travel and ecommerce space using a range of ML and data analysis methods. Use our huge data repositories to push our business metrics to their bounds, directly and indirectly. Foster a culture that constantly raises the bar for us and others and supports the freedom to explore and innovate.

Work on tough problems. Can we detect causation between metrics and bookings? How can automatically answer our users’ questions? How do we tune our AB testing platform to ensure we aren’t optimizing noise? How do we measure experiment success to properly trade off type I and II errors? What is the ideal caching strategy for prices and how do build an ML model to implement it? How can you detect anomalies within more than one million time-series that we track daily? Can you separate between bots and human traffic? Can you make our across-data-centers replication into smart replication using ML models? These are just a few of the diverse questions we tackle and some which you will lead your team to crack. You will be impacting every aspect of the business and it will require various techniques, from diving deep into data with SQL and Big Data tools, all the way to deploying modern machine learning models.

Deliver results. Work directly with the heads of the business departments and the product management team. Influence them with compelling product ideas based on data insights that can move the dial on our business.

Work in one of Asia’s most vibrant cities. Bangkok provides a setting like no other: edgy, luxurious, impossibly sensorial, endlessly layered. The perfect junction of a globally minded career and the heart of Asian travel.

What You’ll Get The Chance To Do
  • Balance quantitative data analyses with qualitative user insights to uncover how our users book travel to drive new and existing product impact.
  • Build, validate, test, and deploy machine learning or other data science models to predict and influence the behavior of consumers with the goal of optimizing products & processes.
  • Test and validate insights via rapid experimentation and deployment.
  • Interface with business/operation teams and key stakeholders at all levels to formulate solutions & product changes informed by your findings.
  • Leverage data to help the business answer questions around further expansion, products, process optimization, cost optimization, customer acquisition/retention/churn and any other business goals that can be addressed through data insights.
  • Form strong, cross-functional relationships with designers, product managers, software developers, and marketers who build, design, and optimize our technology and tools.


What You Bring
  • Vast analytical problem-solving capabilities & experience.
  • Experience in leading a team of both researchers and analysts preferably in an ecommerce, tech, banking, advertising or management consulting environment.
  • Statistical knowledge and extreme proficiency in SQL. Comfortable with R, Python and Tableau. Experience with big data technologies (Hadoop/Vertica) is a plus.
  • Strong understanding and implementation experience of predictive modeling algorithms such as regressions, time series, neural networks, clustering, decision trees and heuristic models, with familiarity dealing with tradeoffs between model performance and business needs.
  • Experience combining user research and data science methodologies across multiple products and teams.
  • Experience with research applications pertaining to user experience, marketing, and market insights.
  • Fantastic communication skills that enable you to work cross-functionally with product managers, tech geeks and design gurus, building solid relationships with a diverse set of stakeholders.
  • The ability to convey complex solutions to a less technical person.
  • Bias for action.
  • Advanced degree (MSc/PhD) in Computer Science, Economics, Engineering, Operations Research, Physics or Mathematics/Statistics preferred.

We welcome both local and international applications for this role. Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance available for eligible candidates.

Agoda is a Booking Holdings (BKNG) company, the world’s leading provider of brands that help people book great experiences through technology.
